title: Leadership Practical Competency Enhancement: Information Literacy Development Program for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can identify and evaluate credible information sources in the nursing field.
Students can create a concept map explaining the relationship between information literacy and lifelong learning.
Students can simulate the information utilization process—from literature search to clinical application—through PBL projects.
Learners can accurately identify fake information related to nursing practice with over 90% accuracy using information evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
